Articles.Content: Happy New Year 2014Ã¢â„¢Â¥
Happy new year! May we have another year of explosions and science!
New Year, new updates!
We should have a thread with all our new year's resolutions for 2014 regarding KSP.

Happy new year!

.

My resolution is to never, ever, ever forget to put batteries or a power source on a long range ship again. And maybe rescue Bill from Duna. If he's good.

I'll probably launch fireworks in KSP to celebrate the turn to 2014. Although I doubt I'll be here by the great turn.

And I probably should give Bill, Mitkin and Mallan a new years gift in exchange for having them sit at Duna for so long. Or at least return them to Kerbin.

Happy new year! My resolution is that i will try to land on Duna and Ike before 2014 has passed, which is a pretty hard goal since i haven't even landed a manned mission on Mun och Minmus.

Edited December 31, 2013 by harald705

Happy New Year!

My resolution for 2014 is to achieve successful interplanetary travel to Duna, Eve and beyond. But before this I have to improve my rocket designs.

My resolution for 2014 is to set up that goshforsaken Laythe base.

Although given the circus Laythe has been doing regarding Kethane pockets, it might take a loong time.
don't worry people! cant get to duna? just get mechjeb to do it!... very good teacher

Hey, how come your thread gets more replies than mine?

...

Ah, screw it. Happy New Year!

My KSP resolution is to do that darn Grand Tour by Christmas. Also, maybe land on Moho before my birthday.

Edited December 31, 2013 by The Jedi Master

HAPPEH NEW YEAR AND A MURREH LATE CHRISTMAS!

I don't do resolutions.
Yeah Happy New Year folks!
Happy new year !

We had the biggest firework in town. It weighted 620 gams. O.o

It flew up very high, leaving golden exhaust. Then it exploded in the highest flare I have ever seen.

Something strange is happening outside. It seems everyone is starting their own space program,but not a single rocket makes it into orbit. They all explode shortly after launch. I think they need more struts...

Jokes aside,happy new year everyone!

I wish all Members a happy new Year TOO and to the developers: KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK! I never played such a interesting Game!

KSP is just AWESOME!

Cheers!

MMarsMM

HAPPY NEW YEAR!

CHEERS!

MMarsMM

KSP is the most interesting Game i ever played! Keep up the good work!

I WISH YOU ALL A HAPPY NEW YEAR TOO!

Cheers!

MMarsMM

Happy New Year from Czech Republic.

*cough* *cough* Goddammit, here is lots of smoke from a fireworks.
Happy new year!
Happy New Year, in true Kerbal style!

Happy New Year's Eve! I whipped up a 2014 celebration thing.

Edited January 1, 2014 by Agent30632

Happy New Year everyone.

I'm definitely going to get someone onto another planet this year. Maybe even return them too, who knows?
